features: Innovative laundry capsule technology gets between the fibers to clean hidden dirt
70% of soils on your clothes are invisible
Designed with 10 concentrated cleaning actives to remove visible and invisible dirt without the need to pre-treat
Provides a gentle and deep, hygienic clean even in case of tough stains. Contains no dyes and perfumes
Recognized by the National Eczema Association and the National Psoriasis Foundation
Equipped with 50% more cleaning power vs. Tide Original Liquid
Works in all machines and water conditions
Try Tide Power PODS for 50% more cleaning power vs. Tide Original Liquid
body.description: Keep your family happy and keep your clothes brilliantly clean with Tide's perfume- and dye-free Hygienic Clean Heavy Duty 10X Free detergent! Designed to give your fabrics a gentle, hypoallergenic clean down at the microscopic level, Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy Duty 10X Free Power PODS remove both visible and invisible dirt from your garments while remaining kind to your skin, giving you a clean you can trust.Containing 10 concentrated cleaning actives, Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy Duty Free is not only clinically tested to be gentle on sensitive skin, it also gets between fibers to clean hidden dirt you didn't even know was there.In times of great uncertainty, get a clean you can be certain about: Get a Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy Duty 10X Free!

Provides a deeper clean that's gentle on skin. Keep your clothes brilliantly clean and your family's skin safe. Protects clothes from stretching, fading, and fuzz. No dyes, no perfumes. Helps reduce wrinkles and control static while it's mild on sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tide Pods - A Frugal Saver and Clothing Protector!
reviews.reviewText: As someone who has always been conscious of stretching their budget, I've often opted for cheaper laundry detergent brands in the past. However, my perception of premium brands like Tide Pods has completely shifted after trying them out. Let me tell you, they are worth every penny!Tide Pods have proven themselves to be an excellent investment, especially for someone like me who aims to save wherever possible. The first thing that caught my attention was their convenience. The pre-measured pods eliminate the need for measuring cups, making laundry a breeze. It also prevents any wastage, ensuring I use just the right amount for each load, which helps maximize the value of every purchase.But the real magic of Tide Pods lies in their exceptional cleaning power. Even with cheaper brands, I used to resign certain stained or soiled clothes to a life of being relegated to cleaning duties around the house. However, with Tide Pods, I've noticed an incredible difference. If I accidentally spill some of the detergent on my clothes, I don't panic anymore! Throwing the affected garment into the wash with a Tide Pod has consistently saved the article of clothing.In the past, I'd often experience fading, fabric damage, or stubborn stains that wouldn't budge with cheaper detergents. But Tide Pods have been a game-changer in this regard. Not only have they successfully removed tough stains, but they've also helped maintain the quality of my clothes over time. The colors stay vibrant, the fabric remains soft, and I've noticed far less wear and tear compared to when I used budget detergents.I appreciate the reliability of Tide Pods; I can confidently use them on all types of fabrics without worrying about potential damage. They have proven to be gentle on delicate items and tough on stains, making them a versatile choice for all my laundry needs.While some may argue that Tide Pods are more expensive than other brands, the money I save by not having to replace damaged clothes offsets the cost. With cheaper alternatives, I ended up spending more in the long run due to the need for constant fabric replacements. So, the investment in Tide Pods not only preserves my clothes but also keeps my wallet happy in the long term.In conclusion, as a self-proclaimed tightwad, Tide Pods have changed the way I do laundry. The peace of mind they provide, knowing that my clothes will be well taken care of and that stubborn stains don't stand a chance, makes them worth every penny. If you're looking for a premium laundry detergent that saves your clothes and your budget in the long run, Tide Pods are definitely the way to go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the best!
reviews.reviewText: I love these tide pods and I love that I can get them on a subscription. They are the only ones that I use. They don’t give bikes kids any skin allergies or rashes they’re super clean they work on heavy size loads as well as little loads they make my linen smell. Great, my comforter smell. Great my rug smell. Great my curtains smell great everything smells amazing. Highly recommend you getting this on subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I only ever use Tide Pods. More specifically, I only ever use these ones. I don't think other detergents clean clothes well, nor do they make them smell nice. These do. Not only is this a large quantity that you're buying, these pods are very large. After having these, the small ones just don't suffice for me anymore. I feel more secure using the specific pods. They are truly heavy duty and clean your clothes very well, no matter the size of the wash load. Spring Meadows is also the only scent that I use. It smells fresh and clean. I always worry that any detergent I use won't clean my clothes and will leave my clothes smelling funky throughout the day while I use them. But these Tide Pods protect me from that. After many uses, I'm absolutely confident in the cleanliness and quality these provide.Also, I have eczema and highly sensitive skin. It's very hard to find lotions, soaps, serums, detergents, etc for my skin because my skin reacts so easily. Not once have I ever reacted to these. I've used these so many times and, still, my skin does not react.If you haven't used these, I HIGHLY recommend it. As long as they continue to make these, I will always buy this particular pod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tide Power PODS: For When Your Laundry Looks Like a Crime Scene!
reviews.reviewText: Laundry warriors, gather 'round because it's time to talk about the real MVP of the laundry room – Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy Duty Power PODS! 🌼🌪️👚You know those days when your laundry pile is so daunting it looks like it's auditioning for a horror movie? Fear not, for Tide's got your back, and they've brought out the big guns – the Heavy Duty Power PODS. These little pods are like tiny laundry superheroes, here to save your clothes from the clutches of invisible dirt (yes, that's a thing).First off, they come in this cool pod form, like laundry detergent for adults. No more measuring, pouring, or pretending to be a chemist – just toss one in, and you're on your way to laundry greatness. And they smell like a meadow in spring, so your clothes will be singing with joy.But let's talk about the heavy-duty part. These Power PODS can tackle visible dirt, invisible dirt, and dirt that hasn't even been invented yet. They're so tough; your clothes will come out feeling like they just did a CrossFit workout (minus the sweat stains).Now, let's address the packaging – it may vary, but it's always a surprise! It's like a little gift from Tide, a laundry lottery of sorts. Who knows what your next box will look like? It's the excitement you never knew you needed in your laundry life.In conclusion, Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy Duty Power PODS are like having a laundry wizard in your machine. They make your clothes cleaner than a cat in a bubble bath, and the laundry process is so easy it's practically a laundry party. So, toss those laundry fears aside and get ready for laundry day like never before! 🌟👕🪄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this detergent!
reviews.reviewText: Something about the word, " hygienic" just makes me feel all is well with the world so I decidedto try this particular make of Tide Pods. In recent uses, I was mildly allergic to the detergent and would develop an annoying itch but with this one, I do not. The smell is wonderful and lasting. The pods are twice the size of regular pods so I feel like my laundry is getting the amount of soap it deserves with just one pod.They seem to last longer than the regular sized pods I was purchasing before. I am having zero issue with any allergies to this product and am super satisfied with the results I have gotten while using the Tide Hygienic Pods. I have tries another scent in this and its great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes clothes smell fresh with ease
reviews.reviewText: No mess, great scent, but not the best at removing stains
works well on stains when pre soaking Nicole

I believe this is my favourite detergent so far. Is pretty good for the stains and dirt, as well as getting out any smell from sports clothes and mildew on towels. The scent is not as strong as other brands. Too bad is not always available.

reviews.reviewTitle: So far the best laundry detergent I've used
reviews.reviewText: Super clean clothes. If this came as a laundry strip packaged in a sustainable manner it would be the perfect detergent.

A clean that can't be beaten. This laundry soap gets one's clothes super, super clean. Yes, it's is a bit pricey but it's worth the cost. When u use this laundry soap, cleans like clothes and once they are dried u would think that u just bought the item at the store cause that's how clean this gets your clothes... If u want your clothes clean then u will want this Tide!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best for scent free clothes washing
reviews.reviewText: This is the only detergent I use now for all my laundry. Its scent free and safe to use on infant and toddler clothes. My kids have eczema so this detergent is fantastic. No scent, no harsh chemicals and removes stains. The only complaint is that it doesn't completely remove heavy scented laundry (i.e. chlorine from swimsuits).
